item.title: Dfs
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

Heres the model link.
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?yfzyd5zymfw

And the ints

if(i == #####) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aString170 = "Draconic visage"; // Item Name class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.anInt174 = #####; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = -1; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = -1; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 1697; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 567; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 152; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -5; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -5; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Draconic visage.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
